mapper.sql: c_id, c_fc, c_user, c_jfdw, c_dwjg, c_yjfy, c_scfyzq_date, c_bcfyqq_date, c_bcfyzq_date, c_bcjfzq_date, c_costName, c_real, c_remarks, h_number, cn_id
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,so.* FROM costname c, cost so WHERE c.cn_id=so.cn_id AND so.h_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{h_number}),'%')

SELECT c.*,so.* FROM costname c, cost so WHERE c.cn_id=so.cn_id
AND so.h_number in (
'${li}',
'')
AND so.c_bcfyqq_date>=#{qq}
AND #{zq}>=so.c_bcfyzq_date
AND so.cn_id in (
'${lis}',
'')
mapper.insert: insert into cost (c_id, c_fc, c_user, c_jfdw, c_dwjg, c_yjfy, c_scfyzq_date, c_bcfyqq_date, c_bcfyzq_date, c_bcjfzq_date, c_costName, c_real, "c_ remarks", h_number, cn_id) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cFc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cJfdw,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cDwjg,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cYjfy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cScfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cBcfyqqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cBcfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cBcjfzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cCostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cReal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

c_id,
c_fc,

#{cFc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update cost
c_fc = #{cFc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_jfdw = #{cJfdw,jdbcType=REAL},
c_dwjg = #{cDwjg,jdbcType=REAL},
c_yjfy = #{cYjfy,jdbcType=REAL},
c_scfyzq_date = #{cScfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE},
c_bcfyqq_date = #{cBcfyqqDate,jdbcType=DATE},
c_bcfyzq_date = #{cBcfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE},
c_bcjfzq_date = #{cBcjfzqDate,jdbcType=DATE},
c_costName = #{cCostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_real = #{cReal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_remarks = #{cRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
h_number = #{hNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cn_id = #{cnId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cost set c_fc = #{cFc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_jfdw = #{cJfdw,jdbcType=REAL}, c_dwjg = #{cDwjg,jdbcType=REAL}, c_yjfy = #{cYjfy,jdbcType=REAL}, c_scfyzq_date = #{cScfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, c_bcfyqq_date = #{cBcfyqqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, c_bcfyzq_date = #{cBcfyzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, c_bcjfzq_date = #{cBcjfzqDate,jdbcType=DATE}, c_costName = #{cCostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_real = #{cReal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_remarks = #{cRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, h_number = #{hNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cn_id = #{cnId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
